## Online {#get-online}

During the beta testing phase, the application is hosted on Shinyapps.io: [https://aldomann.shinyapps.io/biodose-tools-beta/](https://aldomann.shinyapps.io/biodose-tools-beta/)


## On RStudio {#get-offline}
*This is a work in progress.*

The application can be easily installed by runnning
```r
install.packages("biodose-tools")
```

Alternatively, if you want to download the development version, you can just run
```r
devtools::install_github("biodosimetry-uab/biodose-tools-package")
```
